DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of Clinical Effect of Platelet Rich Plasma Combined With Laser on Acne Scar
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effect of Platelet Rich Plasma Combined With Laser on Scar
DOC.detailed_description: Platelet Rich Plasma may relieve the adverse effect of laser treatment. and it can be expected to improve acne treatment result.
DOC.criteria: moderate to severe acne scar taken procedures for acne scar within 6 months underlying diabetes mellitus, keloid, or malignancy
